argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | metelcls.2 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 |  | metelcls.3 | |- ( ph -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) |
| 3 |  | metelcls.5 | |- ( ph -> S C_ X ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_met1stc | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. 1stc ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> J e. 1stc ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_mopnuni | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> X = U. J ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> X = U. J ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_sseqtrd | |- ( ph -> S C_ U. J ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- U. J = U. J |
| 10 | 9 | #P_1stcelcls | |- ( ( J e. 1stc /\ S C_ U. J ) -> ( P e. ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) <-> E. f ( f : NN --> S /\ f ( ~~>t ` J ) P ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 8, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( P e. ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) <-> E. f ( f : NN --> S /\ f ( ~~>t ` J ) P ) ) ) |
